channel.title: CVE Feed for KDDI CORPORATION -- HGW BL1500HM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for KDDI CORPORATION -- HGW BL1500HM

item.title: CVE-2024-28041|2024-06-04T18:03:25.495Z -- kddi%20corporation -- hgw%20bl1500hm
item.description: HGW BL1500HM Ver 002.001.013 and earlier allows a network-adjacent unauthenticated attacker to execute an arbitrary command.

item.title: CVE-2024-29071|2024-06-04T17:56:49.711Z -- kddi%20corporation -- hgw%20bl1500hm
item.description: HGW BL1500HM Ver 002.001.013 and earlier contains a use of week credentials issue. A network-adjacent unauthenticated attacker may change the system settings.

item.title: CVE-2024-21865|2024-03-25T04:11:34.280Z -- kddi%20corporation -- hgw%20bl1500hm
item.description: HGW BL1500HM Ver 002.001.013 and earlier contains a use of week credentials issue. A network-adjacent unauthenticated attacker may connect to the product via SSH and use a shell.
